gameengine

Class PlayerMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameengine.PlayerMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayer

    public class PlayerMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlayer
    This class is "only" a helper of the controller to manage the MODEL and VIEW of a player in a single class This class is wrapper to contain the view and model to ease the keeping of data
